review: ** ** * ****.he has saved life of my 12 days old son.very polite n wise doctor.my STRONG RECOMMENDATION for him.**** ******* ** *** ***********also not at all money minded.trully dedicated doctor to his patients.my whole hearted respect n wishes for such a kind man

review: Vivaan and Taashvi  favorite doctor " Neeraj Adhlakha " has been an extraordinary dedicated ,caring , helpful doctor throughout....Thank you so much for taking care of the kids .....we were lucky to have him take care of the kids till the time we were in Delhi, will miss him surely :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ** *** ** *** **** ********** ******* ** *****havent visited anyone else in last 12 years for both my kids.**** **** ********* *** apt treatment.**** * *** *** ** **** *******no worries when are are under his treatment.** *********** ***** ** *********** ** *** *******more than 💯 satisfied whenever v visit him.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was visiting my in-laws home where my son had fever. He is having a history of febrile convulsions so we alway take care of his high fever. My bother in law recommended this doctor saying that in one or two doses of the doctor, kids get fine. We visited the clinic, we explained that it’s is normal chest congestion due to Delhi pollution and seasonal cough. Doctor provided two syrup - omnacortil forte, amoxycillin oral suspension. After 2 days course, ** *** ****** **** ******** *** ******** He was not eating much and we thought that due to his health. He is very jolly kid so we were more concerned . Then one night my son had a lot of sweat as if someone poured a water on him, next night he started screaming and his diaper leaked after half an hour of sleep. We were clueless, what’s happening to him. He was very restless and after two hours of consoling and comforting him* ** *** ****** ** **** ********** *** ********* *** ** **** ******* ** ****** ***** *** ********** ** **** ********* ** *** *** **** ******* ** ***** ********* *** **** *** ** ****** ********* **** ***** *** ****** ***** *** ***** ** ****** *** ** *** ******** *** ****** ******** *** ****** ******** *** ***** ********.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr was not in correct state of mind while attending us. He was fighting with reception on phone to not take more patient. In all this he hardly saw our kid with full attention and thus missed a important blister to note which kid was suffering with in mouth. Overall I paid 800 just to listen his fight and candy for my kid. Thank you Dr. I hope you find peace

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: For the consultation fees he charges, he can atleast not take phone calls every five minutes when attending a patient. * ****** ** **** * **** ************ *** ** ***** having said that he was not much interested in attending to us. The clinic didn't even bother taking the vitals such as temperature, oxygen saturation etc. The staff asked us to check the body weight when we went to them enquiring about something else. *** *** **** **** ** *** *** ****** **** I was expecting better.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ******* ******* Doesnt want to make a regular customer out of you. Just want to treat you well and get on with the next patient. Very learned doctor. We wanted to get our kid admitted but he talked us out of it and asked us to stay on oral meds. our kid is just 20 months and being admitted would have been very traumatic for him. Our kid is doing better now. In todays scenario its very difficult to find such a doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My child, who is 05 yrs old, had been suffering from high fever for 10 consecutive days. I had consulted several Paediatricians here in Allahabad. However, his fever kept on high end. Then I consulted Dr. Neeraj Adhlakha and he diagnosed some infection in liver. He not only explained the disease but also prescribed minimum pathological test and medicines. Within three days my child responded to the treatment. I am indeed very thankful to Dr. Neeraj.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Childhood Infections,Paediatric Critical Care,Paediatrics - Chest,Children's Health,Paediatric Intensive Care,
review: Dr neeraj is just next to god. Total life saviour. I bless him abundantly for his true dedication towards his patients. For me, he’s an absolute alternative to a superman !!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I always recommend Dr Neeraj to mothers as he know what should be given to our kids. He is a good doctor,no doubt.

review: Amazing doc, just that management needs to be improved. The doc is Always available on call. Recommend him.

tags: None
review:
Very good doctor. He understands concerns of parents very well. Very good diagnosis, no unnecessary medicines. 
Easily available over phone. Only issue is time management in clinic. You have to wait long even with prior appointment.

tags: None
review: Excellent Doctor.. Never seen a doctor like like him. Created a well thought-out clinic. Very neat and clean. Most importantly doctor advises medicine if necessary else prefer home remedies which is good for new born babies. Does not mint money.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
From birth of my child to 6 yrs we have been referring to Dr adlakha . We can discuss with him freely and he listens to parents carefully.

Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very friendly but professional while dealing with the child during treatment. He is a very good pediatrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Very friendly doctor....Listens patiently to all problems and the best part is that he prescribes min. possible medicines....
Mostly one visit is enough....

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: ************* ****** ** very experienced He giving enough time to every patient nd nice behaviour nd satisfied

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I was changed many doctors for my daughter but all of them are useless . I am impressed with Doctor when he said don’t use antibiotics until i will not suggest. 

He understood the issue at the very first day and treated my daughter in a same way.

My daughter Mayra now looks good and improving day by day in a healthy way.

Doctor Availability at any time over the phone is again a very impressive thing.

Thanks Neeraj Adlakha...

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Very competent, understands the patient well, keeps patient's history in mind, approachable at any hour (one of the biggest plus points), not at all commercial, recommends medicines only when necessary....A great padetrician highly recommend👍

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: He is gem of a person.. My son is going at his clinic when he was only 10 days old and now he is 7 years old.. His treatment satisfaction is 100 percent without any doubt..though I shifted at noida but still I used to visit his clinic only for even a small problem..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My kids have been going since childhood its been 12 yrs and fully satisfied.He gives minimum medicines and explains disease and things to avoid.As we stay far from clinic he even sometimes tells on phone also if symptoms are not severe.For reports also he tells to tell on phone and not to cum to clinic** **** ***** *** ** ** *** ** *** **** ********** ******

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My 5 years daughters has continueous cough since November 2018. Tried many doctors and other treatments but all in vain. Her coughing condition got bad day by day.  Then Dr Neeraj diagnosed her with acute bronchitis. In  Just 1 weeks medication prescribed by Dr. Neeraj Adlakha, Helped to retain my daughter's health to 100%. She is healing up nicely. Regards to Dr.  Neeraj Adlakha. He is  a great doctor.

tags: Wait time,
review:
I must say that no one should visit the clinic on the given time as they usually make you wait for more than one hour...bad system of giving appointments...thumbs down👎
Although the doctor is good but waiting time irritates you so mch that you feel like to go back .
Disappointed 😣

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: All things are good.... ****** ** *****..but main problems about the appointment timing actually my appointment time is 7:00 pm but my number come at 8.15. actually the appointment system of doctors means not good people wait for 1 hours minimum after appointment..pls solve it.
